name: Path of the Beast
description: Barbarians who follow the Path of the Beast allow their rage to physically transform them, manifesting bestial traits such as claws, fangs, or a powerful tail.

3.name: Form of the Beast
3.description: When you enter a rage, you choose one bestial form that lasts for the duration of the rage.

options.name: Bite
options.description: Your mouth transforms into a bestial maw. Once per turn when you hit with this bite, you regain hit points.

options.name: Claws
options.description: Each of your hands transforms into claws. When you take the Attack action, you can make one additional claw attack as part of the same action.

options.name: Tail
options.description: You grow a lashing tail that can deal damage and be used to increase your AC as a reaction.

6.name: Bestial Soul
6.description: Your natural weapons count as magical, and you gain enhanced mobility options such as climbing, swimming, or leaping while raging.

10.name: Infectious Fury
10.description: When you hit a creature with a natural weapon, you can force it to make a saving throw or take psychic damage or attack another target.

14.name: Call the Hunt
14.description: You can empower allies with feral vigor, granting temporary hit points and bonus damage while you rage.
